title: This stylish Pottery Barn outdoor sectional is now over $550 off
description: Transform your entire patio with Pottery Barn’s Indio Eucalyptus Outdoor Sectional that has six versatile pieces to fit every type of space.
content:
• Pottery Barn's Indio Eucalyptus Outdoor Sectional is on sale for $2,235, marked down from $2,794.
• The six-piece sectional is made from FSC-certified eucalyptus wood and features a weathered gray finish.
• The sectional is recommended for covered or indoor storage during winter months.

As fall approaches, your mind might be shifting from sun-soaked afternoons to back-to-school season. And before you know it, Labor Day—the unofficial end of summer—will be here. But don't pack away your summer dreams just yet! This is the perfect time to snag an incredible end-of-season deal on new patio furniture.

You can transform your entire patio with this incredible Pottery Barn Indio Eucalyptus Outdoor Sectional that's now 20% off—that's a whopping $559 off! This best-selling, highly-rated outdoor sectional features six flexible pieces to fit every type of outdoor space—whether big or small. Check out more details below and how you can grab yours today.

Pottery Barn deal: Save over $550 on this outdoor sectional

Crafted with FSC-certified Eucalyptus wood, this Indio Outdoor Sectional has a gently weathered gray coastal vibe that will look right at home in a variety of surroundings. The set includes one left armchair, one corner, three armless chairs and one right armchair, so that you can change the configuration to best suit your space. Add on an ottoman (sold separately) to take your outdoor lounging comfort to the next level.

While the cushions are sold separately, there is a large selection of Sunbrella fabric colors and patterns to choose from, so you can go bold or neutral, depending on your space and taste. If you live in a climate that experiences inclement weather you’ll need to store or securely cover the sectional during the winter months, but we think that small hassle is more than made up by how beautiful this set looks. Plus, because it’s made from FSC-certified wood, every purchase helps support healthy forests across the world.

Top early Labor Day appliance sales happening now

As Labor Day approaches, Samsung has been heating up some hot savings on their highly-rated appliances. From refrigerators, washers and dryers to dishwashers, you can expect to save up to 45% off right now!
Shop the Samsung Labor Day appliance sale

Shop the KitchenAid Labor Day appliance sale

Shop the Café Labor Day appliance sale

The GE Labor Day sale is happening now through September 10, you can save up to 40% on their highly-rated appliances, and we've rounded up our top picks below.
Shop the GE Labor Day appliance sale

Wayfair is proving to be a serious contender in the appliance market. While you might not associate them with major appliances, they're currently offering excellent early Labor Day sales on top-tier brands like Bosch, Samsung and more. With some items marked down by up to 44%, this is a prime opportunity to grab a high-quality appliance at a fantastic price.
Shop the Wayfair Labor Day appliance sale
8. Sharp Labor Day appliance sale
During the Sharp Labor Day Sale, happening now and running through Wednesday, September 10, you can score savings of up to $1,800 on top-of-the-line major kitchen appliances. There has never been a better time to invest in your home. Don't miss these Sharp Labor Day deals happening now:
Shop the Sharp Labor Day appliance sale
9. The Home Depot Labor Day appliance sale
The Home Depot Labor Day appliance sale, happening now through September 3, is offering up some hot savings on major appliances! We spotted up to 40% off on select appliances, including refrigerators, dishwashers, ranges and washer and dryers. Plus, you can also save more when you spend more on select appliances, making this a great time to upgrade all of your old appliances for less.
Shop The Home Depot Labor Day appliance sale
When is Labor Day 2025?
Labor Day always falls on the first Monday in September. This year, that's Monday, September 1, offering one last long summer weekend perfect for fun in the sun, barbecues and incredible sales!
Is Labor Day a federal holiday?
Yes, Labor Day is one of the 11 federal holidays recognized nationwide.
What stores are open on Labor Day?
Most major retailers will be open on Labor Day, with the exception of Costco, which will be closed. Additionally, most government offices, schools, banks and libraries will be closed. The United States Post Office, UPS and FedEx will also be closed. However, we always recommend you call ahead to verify store hours on holidays.

We found 19 epic deals to shop at REI’s Labor Day sale starting today
Save up to 50% on top outdoor brands like Patagonia, Keen, The North Face and more.
Labor Day is more than just a long weekend to spend soaking up the last moments of summer before fall kicks off. It is a huge shopping opportunity to help you gear up for all your upcoming fall adventures!
The REI Labor Day sale is officially here to help make it easier than ever to gear up with deep discounts starting now through Monday, September 1.
Whether you’re planning a final summer camping trip or gearing up for some scenic fall hikes, REI’s sale has up to 50% off top-rated outdoor gear, apparel and accessories. From trusted brands like Keen, Patagonia, Arc'teryx and more to REI Co-op exclusives, this is your moment to stock up and save.
Shop the 2025 REI Labor Day sale
Below, shop a few of my favorite deals at REI that I'm adding to my cart!
When is the REI Labor Day sale?
The REI Labor Day sale runs from Friday, August 22 through Monday, September 1, both online and in stores.
Do I need to be an REI Co-op Member to shop the sale?
No, but members get exclusive perks like extra discounts and rewards.
What are the REI Co-op membership benefits?
The REI Co-op membership costs $30 and is a lifetime membership. Now through Monday, September 1, new members can get a $30 bonus card when they join the REI Co-op and make a purchase of $50 or more in the same order.
As a consumer co-op, REI Co-op members pay a one-time fee and are part of the REI community for life. Once you pay the $30 membership fee, your membership never expires. Members get access to benefits like up to 10% back annually on eligible purchases (Co-op Member Reward), free standard shipping, access to special offers and sales, member-exclusive bonus cards, early access to curated products and limited-edition gear, the ability to trade in used gear for credit and so much more.
Can I shop REI Labor Day deals online?
Yes! All sale items are available at REI.com, with free shipping on orders over $50.
Are REI Outlet items included in the sale?
Yes—members get an extra 20% off one REI Outlet item during the sale.

Shop the Saatva Labor Day sale

How often should I replace my mattress?
It's generally recommended to replace your mattress every seven to 10 years, depending on its condition and your sleep quality. Signs that it is probably time to buy a new mattress include sagging, lumps, general discomfort and waking up with aches or pains.

The ultimate back-to-school shopping guide: Supplies, dorm essentials, clothing, snacks
We've highlighted the most popular online retailers to get your school shopping done on a budget.
Back-to-school season is in full swing, with some kids already back in the classroom and more headed back every week.
The 2025-26 school year started last week for some here in Texas. That might seem early compared to other states heading back a few weeks later in early September. But regardless of when you or your child are heading back to school, it's never too early to get a jump on your school shopping for supplies and all the other essentials. Plus, with all the germs they'll be around, you might want to stock up your medicine cabinet too.
From supplies, technology and new school clothes to dorm essentials that go way beyond notebooks and highlighters, the USA TODAY Shopping team is scouting all the best places to get your back-to-school shopping done, without spending a fortune.
Check out the ultimate back-to-school shopping guide by category:
- College dorm essentials
- Affordable school supplies
- Back-to-school clothes, shoes and backpacks
- Must-have snacks and bulk shopping
- Back-to-school tech deals
Where to buy college dorm essentials
Staples
Staples' Summer Savings Event ended on Saturday, July 19, but you can still find key savings on back-to-school needs like folders and pens, to dorm essentials like desks, mini-fridges and more. Staples has a search engine to find your student's supply list, if they haven't been sent by the school, and supplies start at just $0.25.
Walmart
A go-to for back-to-school shopping and dorm essentials. Walmart held a competing sale during Amazon Prime Day last week, the Walmart Deals sale. But, the retailer is constantly rolling back prices and offering great finds for less. Plus, it's another place where you can get a wide range of your back-to-school needs, from Crayola crayons to full-length body mirrors for your dorm room.
Wayfair
You won't find binders and highlighters at Wayfair, but you will find absolutely adorable dorm essentials and decor options to make it feel like home. Plus, Wayfair is currently offering an extra 15% off thousands of items through Wayfair Verified.
Where to buy affordable school supplies
Amazon
Prime Day 2025 has come to a close, but there are still plenty of great deals live at Amazon. Amazon is your go-to for back-to-school tech, backpacks and lunch boxes, plus you can save up to 40% on supplies. It's a wonderful resource for parents, especially if you have multiple kids and are stocking up on supplies, or you were given a supply list with things like tissues and Clorox wipes.
Target
Target's back-to-school supplies start at 15 cents, but you can shop and save across several categories including supplies, backpacks, clothing, dorm essentials and more. Plus, you can save even more with Target Red, and the retailer offers an additional 20% off for teachers.
Walmart
School supplies start at just 25 cents at Walmart, lunchboxes and backpacks starting at $1.97, and so much more.
Where to buy new clothing, backpacks and shoes for the 2025 school year
Dick's Sporting Goods
Score great deals on essentials from clothing, athletic wear, shoes and backpacks at Dick's Sporting Goods. You'll find trending shoes from New Balance, Nike, adidas and more, matching sets for daily wear, school essentials like lunchboxes and water bottles and top trends for getting back into seasonal sports.
Nike
Nike is a top brand in back-to-school shopping, as well as a cult-favorite for their everyday wear, sports wear, shoes and even backpacks.
Shop back-to-school clothing, shoes and accessories at Walmart:
- Fashion trends for back-to-school outfits starting at $4
- School uniforms starting at $4
- New shoes starting at $11
- Backpacks starting at $5
Where to stock up on snacks and lunch box must-haves
Sam's Club
Back to school means your kids aren't eating up all the snacks in your house, but it still means that you have to prepare breakfast and lunch in advance, and still keep their favorite snacks around when they come home starving. Get all that and more, in bulk, at Sam's Club. Join today for just $25.
Costco
Back-to-school also means back to busy schedules. When they come home starving, or just for an easy post-school, post-sports dinner, pick up a Costco hot dog or pizza. Plus, you can still stock up on their favorite drinks, snacks, foods and more. Plus, if you sign up for a one-year membership at Groupon, you will get a free $20 Costco card.
Thrive Market
Parenting is a delicate balance that includes trying to provide the healthiest lifestyle for your kids. Help them stay healthy, feel full and still snack on their favorites with healthy options delivered right to your door from Thrive Market.
Where to buy new tech for school
Adobe Firefly
Adobe Firefly is an AI platform that allows you to create images, video, audio and vector graphics. Perfect for helping you submit the most eye-catching school projects.
Amazon
Prime Day 2025 was a huge hit for top tech, from AirPods to Amazon devices. But, just because the July sale is over, doesn't mean you're too late to find some great tech deals! Shop new electronics from top brands like Samsung, Apple, Amazon and more.
Staples
Get your office must-haves at Staples, from printer necessities and laptops to smaller electronics like headphones and calculators.
Samsung
Head back-to-school with the latest tech from Samsung, including smartphones, smartwatches and more, now equipped with Galaxy AI.
